turns.content: Who are Feyenoord's biggest rivals in their pursuit of a Europa League spot this season?
I don't have information about the current season's updates. however, some of the traditional rivals of feyenoord in the dutch eredivisie include ajax and psv eindhoven.
Thanks for letting me know about the traditional rivals of Feyenoord. Can you tell me which team has been performing better in recent years, Ajax or PSV Eindhoven?

In recent years, Ajax has been performing better than PSV Eindhoven. Ajax has won the Eredivisie title in the past four seasons (2018-19, 2019-20, 2020-21, and 2021-22) and has also reached the knockout stages of the UEFA Champions League multiple times. In contrast, PSV Eindhoven has finished as runners-up in the Eredivisie in the past two seasons (2020-21 and 2021-22) and has failed to qualify for the Champions League group stages in recent years. However, both teams remain among the top football clubs in the Netherlands and have a strong rivalry with each other.

It's interesting to know that Ajax has been performing better than PSV Eindhoven in recent years. Do you have any idea about which team has won more matches against the other in their head-to-head encounters?

As an AI language model, I can provide you with statistical data. In the Eredivisie, Ajax has historically had the upper hand against PSV Eindhoven in their head-to-head encounters. According to the stats, out of the 64 matches between these two teams in the Eredivisie, Ajax has won 32, drawn 17, and lost only 15. Overall, Ajax has won more trophies than PSV Eindhoven in the history of Dutch football, while PSV has won more European trophies than Ajax. However, it's worth noting that rivalries and head-to-head records can sometimes be unpredictable and subject to change based on current form and team dynamics.
